translations: n．回顾，回想：回顾过去的事件或经历。
· His memoirs are filled with retrospections of his childhood.
他的回忆录充满了对童年的回顾。

sentences.sentence: Official retrospections continue as to why London 2012 failed to "inspire a generation".
sentences.translation: 官方仍在反思为何2012年伦敦奥运会未能“激励一代人”。

sentences.sentence: Kenneth Pai's(Pai Hsien-yung)novels are replete with profound retrospections of society and culture.
sentences.translation: 白先勇的小说充满了对社会和文化的深刻反思。
